Question & Options:

D. The introduction takes place in Uganda.
Correct Answer: Mr. White introduces Le Chiffre to a member of the Lord's Resistance Army., Steven Obanno is introduced to Le Chiffre by Mr. White., The introduction takes place in Uganda.
